translation.author: Bhikkhu Sujato
translation.title: The Great Discourse on Traces Left Behind

suttaplex.blurb: The Buddha teaches about the six Buddhas of the past, and tells a lengthy account of one of those, Vipassī.
suttaplex.translated_title: The Great Discourse on Traces Left Behind

translations.author: Sabbamitta
translations.title: Die große Lehrrede über hinterlassene Spuren
